title: "A scientist from HSE University has developed an image recognition algorithm"
excerpt: "A scientist from HSE University has developed an image recognition algorithm that works 40% faster than analogues. It can speed up real-time processing of video-based image recognition systems. The results of the study have been published in the journal Information Sciences."
